quotes.text: Wherever you go, go with all your heart.
quotes.author: Confucius

quotes.text: To be yourself in a world that is constantly trying to make you something else is the greatest accomplishment.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.text: The best antidote I know for worry is work.
quotes.author: Gordon B. Hinckley

quotes.text: Try to be a rainbow in someone's cloud.
quotes.author: Maya Angelou

quotes.text: You don't have to be perfect to be loved.
quotes.author: Russell M. Nelson

quotes.text: Darkness cannot drive out darkness; only light can do that. Hate cannot drive out hate; only love can do that.
quotes.author: Martin Luther King Jr.

quotes.text: The weak can never forgive. Forgiveness is the attribute of the strong.
quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.text: Spread love everywhere you go. Let no one ever come to you without leaving happier.
quotes.author: Mother Teresa

quotes.text: The time is always right to do what is right.
quotes.author: Martin Luther King Jr.

quotes.text: Nothing can dim the light which shines from within.
quotes.author: Maya Angelou

quotes.text: Go confidently in the direction of your dreams. Live the life you have imagined.
quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.text: Life is like riding a bicycle. To keep your balance, you must keep moving.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.text: The beginning is the most important part of the work.
quotes.author: Plato

quotes.text: And we know that all things work together for good to them that love God.
quotes.author: Paul the Apostle

quotes.text: The Lord is my shepherd; I shall not want.
quotes.author: King David

quotes.text: The mind is everything. What you think you become.
quotes.author: Buddha

quotes.text: You have power over your mind - not outside events. Realize this, and you will find strength.
quotes.author: Marcus Aurelius

quotes.text: Success is not final, failure is not fatal: it is the courage to continue that counts.
quotes.author: Winston Churchill

quotes.text: Lift where you stand.
quotes.author: Dieter F. Uchtdorf

quotes.text: It is your reaction to adversity, not the adversity itself, that determines how your life's story will develop.
quotes.author: Dieter F. Uchtdorf

quotes.text: Doubt your doubts before you doubt your faith.
quotes.author: Dieter F. Uchtdorf

quotes.text: Knowing yourself is the beginning of all wisdom.
quotes.author: Aristotle

quotes.text: Happiness depends upon ourselves.
quotes.author: Aristotle

quotes.text: Be kind, for everyone you meet is fighting a hard battle.
quotes.author: Plato

quotes.text: It does not matter how slowly you go as long as you do not stop.
quotes.author: Confucius

quotes.text: Wise men speak because they have something to say; fools because they have to say something.
quotes.author: Plato

quotes.text: Hold on. Hope on.
quotes.author: Jeffrey R. Holland

quotes.text: In the end, it's not the years in your life that count. It's the life in your years.
quotes.author: Abraham Lincoln

quotes.text: For I know the thoughts that I think toward you, saith the Lord, thoughts of peace, and not of evil.
quotes.author: Jeremiah

quotes.text: Our greatest glory is not in never falling, but in rising every time we fall.
quotes.author: Confucius

quotes.text: The past is behind, learn from it. The future is ahead, prepare for it. The present is here, live it.
quotes.author: Thomas S. Monson

quotes.text: Weeping may endure for a night, but joy cometh in the morning.
quotes.author: King David

quotes.text: Attitude is a little thing that makes a big difference.
quotes.author: Winston Churchill

quotes.text: What lies behind us and what lies before us are tiny matters compared to what lies within us.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.text: Today you are you, that is truer than true. There is no one alive who is youer than you.
quotes.author: Dr. Seuss

quotes.text: However late you think you are, however many chances you think you have missed, you have not traveled beyond the reach of divine love.
quotes.author: Jeffrey R. Holland

quotes.text: Never let a problem to be solved become more important than a person to be loved.
quotes.author: Thomas S. Monson

quotes.text: Peace begins with a smile.
quotes.author: Mother Teresa

quotes.text: If you're going through hell, keep going.
quotes.author: Winston Churchill

quotes.text: Come unto me, all ye that labour and are heavy laden, and I will give you rest.
quotes.author: Jesus Christ

quotes.text: Keep your face to the sunshine and you cannot see a shadow.
quotes.author: Helen Keller

quotes.text: I can do all things through Christ which strengtheneth me.
quotes.author: Paul the Apostle

quotes.text: Ask, and it shall be given you; seek, and ye shall find; knock, and it shall be opened unto you.
quotes.author: Jesus Christ

quotes.text: In the middle of difficulty lies opportunity.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.text: Not all of us can do great things. But we can do small things with great love.
quotes.author: Mother Teresa

quotes.text:
“I wish it need not have happened in my time,” said Frodo. “So do I,” said Gandalf, “and so do all who live to see such times. But that is not for them to decide. All we have to decide is what to do with the time that is given us.”
- JRR Tolkien (LOTR)
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.text: In a gentle way, you can shake the world.
quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.text: Be still, and know that I am God.
quotes.author: King David

quotes.text: Fear thou not; for I am with thee: be not dismayed; for I am thy God.
quotes.author: Isaiah

quotes.text: Try a little harder to be a little better.
quotes.author: Gordon B. Hinckley

quotes.text: The best and most beautiful things in the world cannot be seen or even touched - they must be felt with the heart.
quotes.author: Helen Keller

quotes.text: Imagination is more important than knowledge.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.text: The Lord loves effort.
quotes.author: Russell M. Nelson

quotes.text: The happiness of your life depends upon the quality of your thoughts.
quotes.author: Marcus Aurelius

quotes.text: Thousands of candles can be lighted from a single candle. Happiness never decreases by being shared.
quotes.author: Buddha

quotes.text: Be the change that you wish to see in the world.
quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.text: The joy we feel has little to do with the circumstances of our lives and everything to do with the focus of our lives.
quotes.author: Russell M. Nelson

quotes.text: Don't you quit. You keep walking. You keep trying. There is help and happiness ahead.
quotes.author: Jeffrey R. Holland

quotes.text: Courage is not simply one of the virtues, but the form of every virtue at the testing point.
quotes.author: C.S. Lewis

quotes.text: They that wait upon the Lord shall renew their strength; they shall mount up with wings as eagles.
quotes.author: Isaiah

quotes.text: A soft answer turneth away wrath.
quotes.author: King Solomon

quotes.text: Decisions determine destiny.
quotes.author: Thomas S. Monson

quotes.text: Getting old is like climbing a mountain; you get a little out of breath, but the view is much better.
quotes.author: Ingrid Bergman

quotes.text: The secret of staying young is to live honestly, eat slowly, and lie about your age.
quotes.author: Lucille Ball

quotes.text: You know you’ve reached middle age when you’re cautioned to slow down by your doctor, instead of by the police.
quotes.author: Joan Rivers

quotes.text: A pleasure is not full grown until it is remembered
quotes.author: C.S.Lewis

quotes.text: What you see and what you hear depends a great deal on where you are standing. It also depends on what sort of person you are.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.text: Water is fluid, soft, and yielding. But water will wear away rock, which is rigid and cannot yield. As a rule, whatever is fluid, soft, and yielding will overcome whatever is rigid and hard.
quotes.author: Lao-tzu (600 BC) Philosopher and Poet

quotes.text: The best way to predict your future is to create it.
quotes.author: Abraham Lincoln

quotes.text: Why fit in when you were born to stand out?
quotes.author: Dr. Seuss

quotes.text: There are far, far better things ahead than any we leave behind.
quotes.author: C.S. Lewis

quotes.text: Life is either a daring adventure or nothing at all.
quotes.author: Helen Keller

quotes.text: Whatever you are, be a good one.
quotes.author: Abraham Lincoln

quotes.text: Why fit in when you were born to stand out?
quotes.author: Dr. Seuss

quotes.text: Hardships often prepare ordinary people for an extraordinary destiny.
quotes.author: C.S. Lewis

quotes.text: Life is to be enjoyed, not endured.
quotes.author: Gordon B. Hinckley

quotes.text: You are never too old to set another goal or to dream a new dream.
quotes.author: C.S. Lewis

quotes.text: We are what we repeatedly do. Excellence, then, is not an act, but a habit.
quotes.author: Aristotle

quotes.text: You have brains in your head. You have feet in your shoes. You can steer yourself any direction you choose.
quotes.author: Dr. Seuss

quotes.text: Let your light so shine before men.
quotes.author: Jesus Christ

quotes.text: One road leads home and a thousand roads lead into the wilderness.
quotes.author: C.S.Lewis

quotes.text: Relying on God has to begin all over again every day as if nothing had yet been done.
quotes.author: C.S.Lewis

quotes.text: Free will though it makes evil possible, is also the only thing that makes possible any love or goodness or joy worth having.
quotes.author: C.S. Lewis
